product_name: Geax AKA TNT 29er Tubeless Foldable Tire - 29 x 2.2
long_description: Geax AKA TNT 29er tubeless foldable tire is a cross-country-loving tire that lets you run tubeless or tubed to meet your riding needs and preferences. Directional small-block tread offers excellent, fast-rolling performance without sacrificing traction; tall shoulder knobs bite confidently to maximize cornering performance. Lightweight TNT (Tube No Tube) XC casing boasts flexible 120 tpi construction with extra sidewall reinforcement for improved protection. TNT design lets you choose between running tubeless (with sealant, sold separately), or going with a traditional tire + tube setup. The folding aramid bead on the Geax AKA TNT 29er tubeless foldable tire seats easily in UST rims and standard rims alike. Double Compound construction puts harder rubber along the center for durability and braking performance; softer rubber is used at shoulders to improve cornering grip.
short_description: Geax AKA TNT 29er tubeless foldable tire is a cross-country-loving tire that lets you run tubeless or tubed to meet your riding needs and preferences.
